abstract: New York Police Dept, which at one time eschewed Taser stun guns due to troubled history with device, is easing its limits on Tasers amid pressure over police shootings; hope is that wider availability will provide police with less lethal option and reduce shootings, but rights advocates warn move may prompt abuse of Tasers.

headline.print_headline: To Reduce Civilian Shootings, Police Dept. Turns to a Device With a Complicated Past
headline.main: New York Police Embracing a Weapon They Have a Complicated Past With: Tasers

snippet: Amid national anger over police killings of unarmed black men, the department is easing its limits on the devices, hoping to reduce police shootings by providing officers a less dangerous fallback....
lead_paragraph: Amid national anger over police killings of unarmed black men, the department is easing its limits on the devices, hoping to reduce police shootings by providing officers a less dangerous fallback.
